info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 11:36AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Fulton County through NOON CDT... At 1136 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Philadelphia, or 11 miles east of Macomb, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Fulton County, including the following locations... Smithfield, Marietta, Bernadotte and Table Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
